attributes.action: Provide more tenable support to citizens with genuine Credit/Debt Problems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Other than the Declaration of Bankruptcy or a crippling Credit History...some citizens with genuine intent are finding it impossible to reasonably resolve their debt.

Debt managememnt simply will not help those on low incomes and in the short term new road taxation laws will add an additional burden to their plight.
